bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: IS, Pathological Condition identical with she zhong 舌腫 , tongue swelling. Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 6: 治舌脹滿 口不得語方，䗪蟲（三十枚），鹽（一升），上二味，以水三升，煮三 沸，含之，稍稍嚥之，日三 , “Recipe to cure tongue distension to a degreethat it fills the mouth and one cannot speak: 30 ground beetles; salt, 1 sheng . Boil these two substances with 3 sheng of water three times until bubbling. Hold [the liquid] in the mouth, and swallow it in very small quantities”.
